lender.name: Shon & Soli
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do and it feels wonderful trying to help those who are trying to better themselves and there family. It really is a gift that just keeps on giving.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I have been immensely blessed in my life and want to help others who are working to improve their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work with architects to help design buildings, mainly hotels. I work primarily on the interior spaces, designing the layout of all the rooms, as well as selecting all the finishes and furniture.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I really want to help people, and This is a way to extend my hand to people I can't reach myself.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Someone helped us once and we want to return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: Helping small companies grow, I provide leadership advice, coaching, and consulting for small to midsize companies in hi-tech areas such as Aerospace, Bio-Tech and Information Technology

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want the money I have to work for others as well as me.
lender.occupational_info: I teach secondary school English and History.

lender.name: Keegan Family
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to make a huge impact on someone's life you otherwise would never have been able to help.
lender.occupational_info: Raising a family, and corporate finance.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: --so that others may simply live

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps, no matter how small.

lender.name: Andre
lender.loan_because: I think this is one of the best ways to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a technichian and my main job is to repair and overhaul gasturbine engines for helicopters.

lender.name: Eileen & Robert
lender.loan_because: We want others to suceed in their endeavors.
lender.occupational_info: We work in construction, we put on stone, brick, and block to houses or buildings.

lender.name: Melisa
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is required.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I heard a report on National Public Radio and it appealed to me. A great program that changes people's life and their local economies. A great chance to make a small difference in the world, but a big difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I like it
lender.occupational_info: secondhand bookseller

lender.name: Gayle
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Girl Scout leader in the United States and I have two steady jobs. I take groups of travellers to different places of interest, around the world, and show them around. I love to travel and learn about the places I get to visit with my tour groups. When I'm at home, I work part time in a Physical Therapy office doing clerical work, statistics, and much more.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: Just doing what I can to make the world a little bit better.
lender.occupational_info: I develop and maintain software that helps businesses track and manage their processes and financial information.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I want to feel a positive part of this world.
lender.occupational_info: I help families learn to stay together when times get tough.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: Its just a little something that I can do to help someone get back on their feet.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies seeking to grow and help them fulfill their promise

lender.name: Manel
lender.loan_because: Small things make a big difference when put on the right place
lender.occupational_info: Working for a private company, my contribution goes to making the most out of the IT investments made.

lender.name: heawon
lender.loan_because: it's a simple way to make a difference, no matter how small.

lender.name: cari
lender.loan_because: I so believe in this concept of micro financing

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: Together we can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop medical diagnostics for diseases and transfer the products to manufacturing. It's a great job.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.occupation: little of this, little of that
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lender.name: Curriers
lender.loan_because: We loan out of a sense of gratitude for the loving help we've received (and receive) from others along the way.
lender.occupational_info: Labor intensive! :D

lender.name: Artistry Cards
lender.occupation: Artistry Cards :: Eco-friendly paper goods company
lender.loan_because: I want to give the opportunity to other global business owners. 5% of all sales at Artistry Cards will be loaned.
lender.occupational_info: Artistry Cards is a Toronto-based greeting card company with a conscience. We sell unique and high-quality stationery products from greeting cards, notebooks and much more. We consider the environment when making our products. All our products are made of 100% stock. Envelopes and packaging are 100% recycled stock.

lender.name: António
lender.loan_because: Everyone who is willing to work hard to improve their lives deserve more support than those who wait for someone to do it for them.

lender.name: Satya
lender.loan_because: I like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I learn stuff.

lender.name: Henriette
lender.loan_because: To give something back

lender.name: Heidi and Greg
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Grace Creative Jewlery
lender.loan_because: It feels good!
lender.occupational_info: I take materials that people of discarded and make leather cuff bracelets that are made from 80% recycled materials.

lender.name: Jessi
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves. We all need a helping hand from time to time and if you can teach or in this case help a person fish then they will eat not only for their lifetimes but for generations to come. We have the opportunity to end poverty for all time!
lender.occupational_info: I am an independent recording artist and music producer. I own and run my own record label which as a woman closes with its own challenges. However, I believe women have the power to change the world.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: It's important to be a global citizen and to make a positive contribution to the worldwide community. When I saw how easy it would be for me to help others, I couldn't resist!
lender.occupational_info: If you're a mom, visit www.OurMomSpot.org an awesome mom-centric site.

lender.name: Kathrin
lender.loan_because: People are beautiful

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I too am an entrepreneur, and know how hard it can be at times. I don't have a lot of money, but I am happy to share what I have. I want to see someone become successful and have a better life for their family.
lender.occupational_info: I build swimming pools in back yards.

lender.name: shawna
lender.loan_because: I care and want to help someone less fortunate then myself.

lender.name: Ginny
lender.loan_because: It feels right.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I compose and play music.

lender.name: Tempus Fugate
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and if my excess can help someone else, that is a good thing.
lender.occupational_info: I help big companies use technology for their business.

lender.name: Kimber
lender.loan_because: helping people acheive their dreams is a wonderful gift to be able to give.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently getting my education. I work in the summer time watching children while their parents are at work.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: I want to help change the world for the better through one family at a time.
lender.occupational_info: The job of the United States Army today is to defend freedom throughout the world. Where there is turmoil we must find peace.

lender.name: Larry & Cathy
lender.loan_because: I am overdue to give something back

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I've experienced what it's like to need a loan to achieve my dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I study ways to help people around the world understand each other better and solve their problems.

lender.name: Haram
lender.loan_because: Well, I don't know. Am I really helping anyone out here? I'm increasingly skeptical about micro-finance. The more I learn, the more I feel like it's pretty impossible to do purely untainted charity with money. But I guess that's reality, and at some point, you've got to take the bad if you want the good.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to be a CNS in pediatric oncology.

lender.name: Shelli
lender.loan_because: the world is much more interconnected than many of us realize. Empowering others to make their own way in the world and then, in turn, pass that empowerment on is what we are called to do as humans.

lender.name: Hohlbeins
lender.loan_because: Om Namah Shivaya
lender.occupational_info: Love all as one

lender.name: Lily
lender.occupation: Mother and school psychology graduate student
lender.loan_because: My parents taught me that sometimes everyone needs a little help on the path to independence. Their help has allowed me to make my dreams come true and I hope my loans can do that for other people.
lender.occupational_info: A school school psychologist helps students with disabilities succeed in school.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I wouldn't be where I am today without all the helping hands that have been there for me throughout my life - it's time to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I love spending time with my family - 4 grown children - as well as time volunteering with babies of young mothers.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: ...I can. ...I want to be an example to my children. ...I can.
lender.occupational_info: At times challenging, most times fun, rewarding

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I believe I am doing my part to spur economic vitalization to the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach adults how to speak, read, and write in the Spanish language.

lender.name: Jason Kiatta
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance at success.

lender.name: Marina
lender.loan_because: I like to give people a chance to improve their life. The least we can do is give up a little bit of what we have, for just a little while.

lender.name: Jil
lender.occupation: Artist, reader, lover of kids, book fairy
lender.loan_because: It gives me JOY to imagine making a difference in the life of someone across the world.

lender.name: Hazel
lender.loan_because: How could I *not* !?
lender.occupational_info: I draw stuff on a computer (which is good, 'cause I'd never be able to do it by hand!)

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I believe in the benefits of earning an honest living.

lender.name: Madison
lender.loan_because: I want to help make an impact in what may help save a persons life.

lender.name: Tammy & Ken
lender.loan_because: If we can lend a small amount of money to help people make better lives for themselves and their communities, and then re-lend to it someone else to do the same... what a great way to invest a dollar!

lender.name: Dave Rogers
lender.loan_because: I can... and also because I think half the boat is sinking.
lender.occupational_info: I use psychology and statistics to improve your experience on websites.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: Its an easy small step, how can you not do it?
lender.occupational_info: I work on rotating equipment that compresses and moves gas/fluids for production needs.

lender.name: Karin and Ron
lender.loan_because: we can!
lender.occupational_info:
Karin works for a University as a Scholarship Coordinator.
Ron is a Counselor, and works with a special population of individuals in various stages of recovery and rehabilitation.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I am so grateful for what I have and I want to give back!

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to feel connected to the world.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: It feels like the right thing to do. I am blessed and want to share it with others.
lender.occupational_info: I buy garbage trucks for the largest waste hauler, in North America.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I feel better when I do. I don't have a lot to give and lord knows I have creditors after me but giving means something.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Career Counselor. I help people who lose their jobs get funding to go to school, retrain and hopefully go back to work at a better wage.

lender.name: Enrique
lender.loan_because: I do not believe that exclusively acting out of self-interest is enough to bring about social equality.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: everyone that has the drive and determination to be a successful entrepreneur at least deserves the chance to fulfill their dreams.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Our personal belief in helping others.

lender.name: rodger
lender.loan_because: if you give a man a fish....
lender.occupational_info: I help maintain a radio telescope to help scientists study the universe.

lender.name: Michael and Diana
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to improve their standing in life. We want to play a small role in achieving those dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Michael has finished up his MBA and is working as a tech transfer analyst in Chicago. Diana is an environmental consultant back in Chicago!

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because:
I wanted to make a difference
GO BLUE!!! GO MICHIGAN!
lender.occupational_info: I go to Rolling Hills Country Day School. I am 11 years old.

lender.name: Mat Dawam
lender.loan_because: they just need to be given an opportunity

lender.name: Mary T
lender.loan_because: my brother John, who is the most benevolent person I know, always teaches me another way of caring.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.occupational_info: I go out to people's cars after they get in an accident and write an estimate on the damage and give them a check for the repairs.

lender.name: Cody & Rachel
lender.loan_because: We ask our parents to use Christmas money they would normally spend on us each year to help others in need. We think that is a great gift!
lender.occupational_info: We are in still in highschool.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I've always felt that I should be doing more to help, and this is an incredibly easy and efficient way to help those who need it most.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student studying brain development

lender.name: Shannon & Dave
lender.loan_because: I can understand what it is like not having a lot. My husband and I just got married in August/07. We both do not make a lot of money, things are tight. But we have the basics and these people do not even have that much. I get more enjoyment from giving then getting. I purchased gift certificates as Christmas gifts and they are the best presents I could ever give myself, and my family! Happy Holidays!
lender.occupational_info: I am a grade 3/4 school teacher. My husband is a dairy farmer (he milks Holstein cows).

lender.name: Mitch
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. My money does no good sitting in a bank, but does more good than I'll ever know in the hands of someone who truly needs it.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: Loaning to other entrepreneurs is one of the ways I "pay it forward". Who knows how may people will be positively affected as each of us grows?
lender.occupational_info: I assist others in taking charge of their own health and well-being - physically, emotionally, financially, and environmentally.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: One person can make a difference in the world and this is just one way "Be the change you wish to see in the world"- gandhi
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Boston University studying International Relations and a minor in Public Health

lender.name: Cassandra
lender.loan_because: I have a part time Commercial Real Estate loan business. So it is second nature to get involved in helping business owners international get the money they need for operate successfully
lender.occupational_info: I have a part time Commercial Real Estate loan business. I loan money for Commercial Real Estate in the U.S.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe we can create a better world working together and I love this program!
lender.occupational_info: I am an actor and and artist. I love painting on canvas as well as furniture!

lender.name: kristin
lender.loan_because: Sometimes my world gets just too small. Connecting to someone literally across the world helps me to remember my place in all of this.

lender.name: Brett, Ginger & Shelby
lender.loan_because: we want to teach our daughter to love and respect people from all over the world.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: there is no reason not to loan.
lender.occupational_info: I attend the university as a full-time student to study East Asian studies. I also work part-time as a staff assistant at the university's IT college.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Seems like an easy way to help out those who are trying to improve their situation.

lender.name: gabe
lender.occupational_info: im trying to start up a brand new clothing skateboarding line. new styles, that very from hip hop, to punk. hats, shirts, and when im comfertable enough to start making them. ill get to the denim wear. i really want this to happen. its been my dream to start a clothing line for skateboarding ever since i found out im not good enogh to get sponsored by a major skateboarding company.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place, even if it's one small step at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of one son, and I work simply to earn enough money to keep my house and my car, otherwise I would spend every day with my son.

lender.name: Roland
lender.loan_because:
Being involved with Kiva allows me to do something that I've wanted to do - namely, microfinancing, but I didn't know how to do so. It makes sense for me to share my resources with other people in parts of the world I may never see. Doing so helps me to become familiar their lives and cultures. And, being a lender helps me in my quest to be a peaceful world citizen.
I also think that learning to share resources opens my heart up to God and acknowledges that my life should be lived in connection to a broad community.
Here is a link to an interview I did on being a Kiva lender: http://www.tavissmileyradio.com/guests09/071709/RolandAllen.html
lender.occupational_info: I work with upper school students in an Episcopal school in southern California. I am the director of college counseling, and I teach a class in philosophy and ethics..

lender.name: Marie Ringler
lender.occupation: Member of Regional Parliament Vienna, Green Party
lender.loan_because: Only if we in the "first world" share our riches, people in developing countries will have a chance to improve their lifes.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Member of the Regional Parliament of Vienna, Austria for the Green Party.

lender.name: Kiva Lender from 5AM
lender.loan_because: We can and we know it works.
lender.occupational_info: We develop custom software that serves the life science industry.

lender.name: Enda
lender.loan_because: Together we can do more.

lender.name: Vivian
lender.loan_because: i believe in inspiration realised
lender.occupational_info: i invite children to draw walkable neighbourhoods in hopes to transform their ideas into the policy

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: helping others is the way i have been raised and this is one way to helping others all over the world is something that I will never let go.
lender.occupational_info: I am a soldier in the US Army, although many may see me as a evil person I truly have a heart of gold.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: this website gives the opportunity to give money more directly and constructively than any other charity I have seen
lender.occupational_info: i develop food safety systems to help businesses reduce food safety risks and meet international standards

lender.name: Tuomas
lender.loan_because: If something is "justice, not charity", this is it.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a computer software that tries to make elevators work better.

lender.name: Matteo
lender.loan_because: helping people help themselves and helping the economy at the same time!! almoust free!! this is the best investment possible!
lender.occupational_info: I sell affordable cosmetics to Brasilians

lender.name: Rick & Debbie
lender.loan_because: We want to help. We have traveled to many countries, 21 so far, and enjoy meeting people and seeing other places and cultures.
lender.occupational_info: Rick - Business/Operations Debbie - Self-employed

lender.name: yannick
lender.loan_because: social responsibility

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: Those of us who live in wealthier countries have an obligation to help people in need.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Most people in the world want nothing but a fair chance.
lender.occupational_info: IT Manager

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: To generate opportunities for those who have less.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired now, but I used to help businesses to get their message across.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: I gave this as a gift to my friend, Marlene Dakita, who have been my inspiration in helping others

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: i am grateful for what i have.
lender.occupational_info: i teach spanish.

lender.name: Mauro Javier
lender.loan_because: "There ought to be behind the door of every happy, contented man some one standing with a hammer continually reminding him with a tap that there are unhappy people; that however happy he may be, life will show him her laws sooner or later, trouble will come for him—disease, poverty, losses, and no one will see or hear, just as now he neither sees nor hears others." --Chekhov

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I truly believe the best way to help those in need is to give them the opportunity to become self-sufficient, and I can't think of a better way to do that than through Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a cardiologist, so as a medical doctor I specifically help people with heart problems in my community.

lender.name: Katharine
lender.loan_because: kiva is a great way to know your money is going directly the person who needs it

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I believe in the "teach a man to fish" path to charity and prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: Game design student

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I think these people need the money and I want help them as much as I can and it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school every day, but not weekends.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good. As a grad student in agriculture, I like to make loans to farmers :)
lender.occupational_info: I'm an agriculture student.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting my sisters who are in need! To strengthen them is to strengthen their families, communities and ultimately make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work with families to build a team of people around them that will support them in 'their' needs, worries, goals and dreams.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: people helping people. simple. no politics. no bullshit. humanity...what a concept...
lender.occupational_info: i raise organic beef cattle

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I started a business by myself and now after 20 years, I want other peoples dream's to come true.
lender.occupational_info: I make the best food possible and back it up with great service, so that people will want to come in every day to eat and spend time with us and the other people that come in to eat.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference to many people who are trying to improve their lives.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I believe that small sacrifices can make an huge impact in this world
lender.occupational_info: Engineer during the week and a Sustainable Adventurer / Volunteer by weekend

lender.name: Jeordan & Gabriel
lender.loan_because: In Hebrew, "Tikkun Olam" means "repairing the world." People can help make the world an even better place through deeds.

lender.name: Vibhor
lender.loan_because: It promotes equal opportunity... Providng access to basic financial servicess to all clases, everyone has opportunity to participate in economic growth

lender.name: Lurdes
lender.loan_because: It helps people having a better life and it feels good to know it.

lender.name: Charles
lender.occupation: Alzheimer\'s care and sp. ed. teacher\'s aide

lender.name: Joop, The Netherlands
lender.loan_because: I love to share and facilitate another person to develop his/her talents.

lender.name: Phil Frisk
lender.loan_because: "I am here only to be truly helpful. I am here to represent Him Who sent me. I do not have to worry about what to say or what to do, because He Who sent me will direct me. I am content to be wherever He wishes, knowing He goes there with me. I will be healed as I let Him teach me to heal." (T-2.V.18)

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: we all should.
lender.occupational_info: I visit manufacturing facilities and ensure they are obeying all environmental rules and minimizing their environmental footprint on the earth.

lender.name: Edel and Tom
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to pursue their dreams of independence and prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: Retired nutritionist and chemist

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I believe in a God who does not see any national boundaries, but loves all humanity equally. It is my desire to love like He loves by helping my brothers and sisters of every color and culture. I am a simple working man, but am grateful for this site that allows me to help even in a small way.

lender.name: Peace Group
lender.loan_because: desire others to have a chance at a better life.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: If we all take a step toward a better world, we'll get there sooner. My vision for a better world is simply one with less greed.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a single mom who works to pay the bills, but I spend my free time teaching middle school and high schoolers science and writing without pay. I also homeschool my own middle school daughter. My passion is creating learning opportunities for kids to get them excited about what they're learning.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: This organization is a brilliant idea!!!!

lender.name: mimoun

lender.name: John and Nancy
lender.loan_because: We been blessed to live in a prosperous country and want to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: We're retired, but John pounds nails with Habitat for Humanity & Nancy helps with reading at a local school.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: 'to give and to receive are one in truth.'
lender.occupational_info: I am working on developing my own professional path.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: it feels really good to help others

lender.loan_because: I have always admired those people with the entrepreneurial spirit and drive to make things happen for themselves and their local economies/communities.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: It's time to start giving back.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand once in a while. This is a way for me to have the chance to extend one.
lender.occupational_info: I have the pleasure of introducing others to some of my favorite authors, the honor of teaching others how to become better writers and stronger critical thinkers, and the privelege of watching my students develop in all sorts of ways.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of women to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help busines people understand their business needs better.

lender.name: daniel
lender.loan_because: i can! :-)

lender.name: maarten
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to support people who need help
lender.occupational_info: We make films and distribute and publish dvd's and audiobooks (spoken books)

lender.name: norm
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes microlending possible for someone of limited means like me.
lender.occupational_info: I play guitar in a Rock and Roll band.

lender.name: Leland
lender.loan_because: I understand how self-employment can not only give financial improvements, but also give a feeling of accomplishment and self-worth.

lender.name: Danz

lender.occupational_info: I do stuff and sometimes get paid money.

lender.name: Axel & Jonathan & Tom
lender.loan_because: We can!

lender.name: Herve
lender.loan_because: because the only difference between them and me is they were born less lucky

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I am so greatly blessed.

lender.loan_because: it's good karma.
lender.occupational_info: I am a knowledge worker, working with computers and via various forms of communication.

lender.name: Laurette
lender.loan_because: I come from a country that has lots of opportunities for anyone willing to work hard. I want to help anyone that has that same drive and determination, but just needs a little help to reach their goals and build a business. It's just a small way of reaching out to our global community.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for a finance company in the trucking industry. The company moved their offices to Texas. I decided to stay in Chicago and look for another position rather than transfer.

lender.name: trixie
lender.loan_because: i can make a difference in the lives of many people and be able to help others in any way that i can.

lender.name: bruce
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance at a better life
lender.occupational_info: help in the management of inpatients in hospital

lender.name: KAPES "FamilyProjects"
lender.loan_because: Every person's life has value, so we should help people get what they need to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: FamilyProjects is made up of family members that live in several areas of the USA with a common goal of helping others.

lender.name: Sheryl
lender.occupational_info: I work with children/teenagers who need emotional support due to having suffered trauma in their childhood.

lender.name: Regina
lender.loan_because: I am inspired to give back to a world that has blessed me. I believe everyone has a chance in life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in career services to assist students in preparing professionally for the workforce after graduation from college

lender.name: Phil & Kathleen
lender.loan_because: We feel these loans encourage and empower those most in need in our world community

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to help others be self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I am in sixthgrade. I love to design websites. I also program in Java and c++. I just like to do things like that. I also play soccer.

lender.name: Janis
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful feeling to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: Jewelry business

lender.name: Daneshvar Family
lender.loan_because: This is one of the ways that we can "share". We are blessed with family, friends, and health. We loan because we want to and can. We loan because it is one way to help someone get their start so as to be able to provide for their family to have what we have become accustomed to: food on the table, roof over our heads, clothes on our backs.
lender.occupational_info: My husband is a business man who has a medical center in the Bronx. I am a mom of 5 and a retired nurse.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Working with entrepreneurs gives me juice! I am grateful for the abundance and prosperity we all share as ONE mind.
lender.occupational_info: We help people successfully navigate transformations in career, wellness and spirt. I encourage you to learn more about yourself with a coach as your guide. Commit to Invest in yourself!

lender.name: Rod
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to help make the world a better place for all people.
lender.occupational_info: I work with our partners to ensure that processes are in place to resolve technical support issues.

lender.name: Burke
lender.loan_because: I have traveled and worked for the last 20 years in the developing world, and so I realize that I have been very lucky in having good opportunities in life such as education and employment. I believe people such as myself all have a responsibility to help our brothers and sisters in other lands, wherever and how best we can. I also know how important it is that people don't become dependent on help from outside, but rather, that they retain a strong belief in themselves and a sense of initiative. Microfinance mechanisms like Kiva are one of the kinds of thing that works. Good luck and don't ever let anything stop you from believing in yourself, and that by succeeding, you can also help your communities.
lender.occupational_info: I manage two organizations and am involved in a third one. The first one works with communities in the Pacific to help them preserve the natural world (biodiversity) around them, while also supporting their need to develop economically and to maintain their cultural traditions. They set their priorities themselves, and we find ways we can provide technical assistance. The other group that I manage is a scientific network that helps scientists from different areas of the Asia-Pacific region -- and with different areas of expertise -- to work together on common problems (like climate change, health issues, etc.). I'm also an owner of a small business.

lender.name: Francie
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to provide a good life for themselves and their families. Our individual lives are globally linked, no matter how far apart we may be geographically. The peace and health of our planet depend on understanding and supporting our shared humanity. These donations are made in honor of my sisters, Carol and Scootie, and in gratitude for the friendship and blessings that we share. Many thanks to the dedicated individuals at Kiva for providing this opportunity to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the Internet and with computer images for my state's environmental protection agency.

lender.name: Phoeby
lender.loan_because: paying my rent to the universe
lender.occupational_info: I teach yoga and ESL (English as a Second Language).

lender.name: Cat
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at this time.

lender.name: Eliza
lender.loan_because: I like helping others who are not as fortunate as me.

lender.name: Del
lender.loan_because: i am lucky. I want for nothing and have a decent job, home and life. I now want to give something back, to other individuals who can obtain some benefit. its coming up to christmas, and these are the best gifts i could recieve.
lender.occupational_info: i work with people experiencing mental illness, in a large city in the north of england.

lender.name: Gehrig
lender.loan_because: I like helping people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary school student.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I believe that we should all give back, as we receive so many of life's rich blessings in so many small ways every day.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother and a doctor - both exciting and worthwhile occupations.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because:
The concept behind Kiva.org intrigued me, as a much of my job is related to the provision of business services to small business start-ups. Finding a mechanism to help transform the lives of others by donating small sums to those willing to take on the challenge of business under some of the most difficult of conditions is great and I’m pleased to play a small part.
I recently heard a quote that expresses some of what I feel “The great thing in this world is not so much where we stand, as in what direction we are moving." (Oliver Wendell Holmes) being part of this project takes me a step in a direction I rather like.
lender.occupational_info: I provide business support services to established, start-up businesses and the general public. A one stop shop for everything.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: i can. :)

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I feel lucky to have opportunities. I would like to help others who may not have the same opportunities.

lender.name: Mike and Lisa
lender.loan_because: We hope it will help someone else realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Mike helps banks protect their internet systems from hackers. Lisa's job is to analyze business service needs her company provides to banks.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: The Lord has blessed me with more than I need for myself and my family. It is truly a gift that keeps on giving. As money is repaid. it can be used by others.

lender.name: Josi
lender.occupation: Coordinator at a trade show company

lender.name: Clare & Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to show my son how little contributions can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a realtor, licensed in MD and DC. I help people buy and sell homes.

lender.name: Bilkis
lender.loan_because: A little helping hand goes a long way

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate to be born in a country with plenty. If the world market can not share the wealth maybe individuals can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a reading teacher on an Apache Indian Reservation in AZ, USA. Being able to read gives children choices in life.

lender.name: Wee-Gee
lender.loan_because: Micro-Loans to small businesses tend to have a greater and longer lasting impact to the entrepreneur and his/her community than simply giving it away ---> A hand-up (training, planning, micro-loan, accountability and support) is far better than a hand-out. The hand-up approach promotes self-reliance and financial independence which leads to development and progress. Conversely, hand-outs encourage continued dependence on the giver. Just as the old Chinese proverb says, "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. But teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime..........(I add) and if you teach his wife to fish, the whole family eats for a lifetime." http://www.globalissues.org/article/26/poverty-facts-and-stats

lender.name: Joe & Jimmy
lender.loan_because: I value the opportunity to teach my grandchildren that when you share you help, and when you help you appreciate!

lender.name: Karen and Tip
lender.loan_because: In memory of Bud Johnson
lender.occupational_info: I love to paint on wood, paper and canvas using a variety of mediums.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.occupational_info: www.microcreditsummit.org

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: we wanted to do something as a family to help others

lender.name: Mary Ruth
lender.loan_because: It's a great feeling to be part of something so positive. i am trying to set an example for my sons so that they will think beyond themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach adults some of what they should know to be successful in the fashion industry in the USA.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: I love.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I have a very good life and feel very lucky to have the life that I do. I have a life rich with love and laughter. If my giving a small amount of money to help someone else improve their life means that they are able to love easier and laugh more then I am able to share a part of my life with that person; even if that person is half way around the world.

lender.name: Cleah
lender.loan_because: Because I know what hard work is---
lender.occupational_info: Appreciating what is out in the world.

lender.name: Bonny and Don
lender.loan_because: We are Christians and enjoy helping others!

lender.name: LaTasha
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others including people less fortunate than I.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time graduate student at Bowling Green State University obtaining a master's in Special Education. I also work in a group home taking care of adults with disabilities part-time.

lender.name: Tom
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a residential school (located in the US, in Connecticut) for students age 14 - 18, all of whom are bound for college.

lender.name: Yolanda
lender.loan_because: Because everyone needs a hand to help them
lender.occupational_info: I teach early head start children; children who are the ages of zero to three

lender.name: Catherine and Lester
lender.loan_because: we believe that small loan will contribute to the economic stability of a family; which transfers strength into the community.
lender.occupational_info: To build a cohesive work environment by helping employees understand each others viewpoints, perspectives, goals and concerns. /I manage our home now that I'm unemployed, and look for employment outside of the home; just guess which is easier.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I hope to help someone achieve their dream. I wish all the best for all the businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I review title documents for attorneys.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Its a good feeling when you know that you are helping someone fullfill their ambitions.

lender.name: Larry and Jackie
lender.loan_because: we care and are doing this as a family cooperative effort.
lender.occupational_info: Heating, ventilation, air conditioning and refrigeration. Registered Nurse.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Why Not?
lender.occupational_info: Work, School, Sleep

lender.name: Mr. McCormick
lender.loan_because: It's the best way for my students to learn about how people in other parts of the world are living.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of History and Technology.

lender.name: Sylvain
lender.loan_because: I want to help people produce crops, vegetables and fruits.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I feel its important to help people who are trying to help themselves out of poverty, especially women.
lender.occupational_info: I make costumes for the theater

lender.name: Our Marketing Team
lender.loan_because: As MBA students at Mills, we recognize the impact of microfinancing on the global economy. We also like helping people become self sufficient and successful in their businesses and lives.
lender.occupational_info: We study hard and have lots of fun working on group projects in Lisa Cain's Monday night marketing management class.

lender.name: Scott & Staci
lender.loan_because: I want to help those that may not be able to get a loan in the normal fashion.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Foot & Ankle Surgeon, and my wife is a Stay At Home Mom.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: To quote Harold Melvin and the Blue Notes: "The world won't get no better, if we just let it be The world won't get no better, we gotta change it yeah, just you and me." -Wake Up Everybody
lender.occupational_info: I teach English and World History to students who are 12,13, and 14 years of age.

lender.name: Alex
lender.occupation: I work to help victims of identity theft
lender.loan_because:
I have been fortunate in my life to have been afforded the privilege to assist others. It is with this privilege that I feel obligated to help others by spanning across any boundary, border or culture.
And besides, as Oprah put it, Kiva is ADDICTIVE!
lender.occupational_info:
Live in New York City. I am of Portuguese heritage. I travel globally frequently and appreciate various cultures. I enjoy rollerblading, theater, baseball and you will most likely find me on a beach when the weather is warm.
Words to live by:
-Each of us are angels with only one wing, and we can only fly by embracing one another.
-The only thing you take with you when you're gone is what you leave behind.
-It is only with the heart that one can see rightly. What is essential is invisible to the eye.
-We may not share the same religious faith but we share the same human faith.
-Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
-Man has been endowed with reason, with the power to create, so that he can add to what he's been given.
-Go out on a limb. That's where the fruit is.
-In order to succeed in life, one must not be afraid to fail.
-Pray as if everything depended on God, and work as if everything depended on man.
-Let us realize that the privilege to work is a gift, the power to work is a blessing, the love of work is success!
aricardo@yahoo.com

lender.name: fabian
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe in helping others achieve the best in their life.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I love to hear the stories that people have to tell as well as learn more about the people and places around the world whom I don't get to meet and see first-hand.
lender.occupational_info: My job is my passion. I help people to feel better and more attuned with their bodies. Connecting so directly with another human being for an hour or so at a time is an absolutely unique experience in our culture and I am dearly thankful I have found my path.

lender.name: Beth
lender.occupational_info: Registered Nurse

lender.name: Suz
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed with such abundance in our country and I believe we need to share these gifts with the world. Why else would it have been given to us? Uplifting others is Holy work.

lender.name: Jeff & Sandi
lender.loan_because: I can. What greater joy could there be than to help people around the world reach their dreams?
lender.occupational_info: Jeff helps negotiate treaties with indigenous peoples. Sandi teaches children who need extra help learning to read.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I am in first grade, and want to use my allowance for charity. I want to treat others the way I want to be treated.
lender.occupational_info: I love being a student in my teacher's class.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: "I expect to pass through life but once. If, therefore, there is any kindness I can show, or any good thing I can do to any fellow being, let me do it now, and not defer or neglect it, as I shall not pass this way again."

lender.name: Ellen & Rick
lender.loan_because: My husband and I want to help others succeed in their business endeavors. We want to give back to my husband's birth country of Peru.

lender.name: Conon
lender.loan_because: As I work in finance with banks, I cannot find a better way to help people in other countries to have a better life. These micro loans provide these people to help their families and community. I'm glad to be part of this.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an accountant for banks. I show how the company is doing in certain financial products.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: To help others achieve economic independence, and provide for their families by sharing my belief in their success through giving.
lender.occupational_info: Provide health care professionals clinical information and patient education regarding pharmaceuticals.

lender.name: Richard & Violetta
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people plan their financial future by advising them to make sound investment decisions in stocks, bonds and real estate. Vicki is a flight attendant for a major airline and gets to visit all corners of the earth.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help others. I would just spend the money on something stupid!
